Posts.Content: ladi553 wrote: Hi I had the core biopsy yesterday . It was just like all my friends here told me so it was not too bad .  I have discomfort now  the dr put like a butterfly stitch on the little incision and it is all black and blue , Dr. told me not to take aspirin or advil just tylnenol ,  The biopsy itself took so much out of me I was so drained and tired .  So now I sit and wait this is hard to do along with the discomfort in breast .  Its been so long that Im just so tired of it all just tell me if it is or is not at this point ,  Well where she took the biopsy was not the spot that was hurting but I guess she knew what she was doing I think after so long you second guess everything right . oh well ill let let everyone know I should hear on Wednesday or Thursday God Bless All Marie Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Had Core Biopsy And Waiting ladi553 mommyalways

Posts.Content: Aug 6, 2009 09:11AM - edited Aug 6, 2009 09:12AM by ladi553 Hi Everyone, Well I got my results on Tuesday I had the biopsy on Monday and the Dr. called on Tuesday I thought oh my God so soon but it was GOOD News it was B9 I thank God for that and I thank God for all of you who have helped me through this it was such a long 2 months , I want to wish all of you the best and hope all is B9 for all Hang in there Angela and Lynnie okay I will still stay on here  and try to help anyone who needs it.  I have to go back in 3 months. Well God Bless All Marie
